title: Aphids
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Deals with periods in the life-history of the common plant louse; close-ups show the insect laying eggs, moulting and feeding. A time-lapse study is used to show wing development; microcinematography shows details of the insect’s beck.
